table.title: Most Read Documents (by Downloads)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 | `IgnoreExtensions` | stats count as "# Reads" by SiteId,DocLocation | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUT Url | sort - "# Reads" | table SiteId,Url,DocLocation,"# Reads"

table.title: Most Read Documents (by Unique Users)
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 | `IgnoreExtensions` | stats dc(UserName) as "# Users" by SiteId,DocLocation | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUT Url | sort - "# Users" | table SiteId,Url,DocLocation,"# Users"

table.title: Most Updated Documents
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 (Event=2 OR Event=4 OR Event=5 OR Event=10 OR Event=14) | `IgnoreExtensions` | stats count as "# Updates" by SiteId,DocLocation | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUT Url | sort - "# Updates" | table SiteId,Url,DocLocation,"# Updates"

table.title: Recently Deleted Documents
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=4 | `IgnoreExtensions` | lookup SPSite Id as SiteId OUTPUT Url | table _time,SiteId,Url,DocLocation
